I, and apparently many others, only became aware of this when hit with the giant bill after the task.  For me, it added $226 (37 percent) to the tasker's hourly rate.  For what?? I understand the taskers don't see any of this.  I called TaskRabbit, and all I got was a useless $80 credit for a future task I will never book unless this fee gets at least partially refunded.  Would love to use this service again, but only if they fix this.

Review.Titre: High service fees and an incomplete project
Review.Contenu: I chose a very well reviewed tasker with 100+ tasks completed for my type of project, painting, and spoke with him in advance of the work including photos of what I needed pained. He estimated 3-4 hours. At 3x the estimated amount of time and needing to come back for a third time I sent him home with the project incomplete. At this point, I was well over budget for the project given the original estimate. For what he did accomplish he did a good job but unfortunately the project wasn't completed and I spent 3x more money than I expected to and still have to finish it myself. Additionally, I was charged for materials that I wasn't expecting to be charged to as I offered to provide everything he needed and $19/hour in taskrabbit fees which I wrongly thought was a $19 charged by the job not per hour. Taskrabbit could be more clear on their service fees including what they're for. I was left with a bad taste in my mouth after my first taskrabbit experience and will not be using the service again.

Review.Titre: Electrician didnt had much clue on hiw…
Review.Contenu: Electrician didnt had much clue on hiw to do the job. It took him 1.5 hrs to understand voltage is low and wire is cracked. Aftet 5 mins of intraction, IAaked if he has done ceiling speakers before and he said yes. Job was not done and i am charged 150$ which is ridiculous!

Review.Titre: Your charges for truth and support of…
Review.Contenu: Your charges for truth and support of $24.00 wasn't expected and it is not a service. As a consumer we shouldn't be responsible for training your employees. I will not be using your services in the future.  I will also write a review for all to see.  Very disappointed with these charges

My cleaner was wonderful and did excellent work and that wasn’t the issue. The issue is… as a customer newly signed up all expenses should be listed. A agency fee for using Taskrabbit was added and that was very expensive. Luckily I had the extra or I would’ve had a real problem on my hands. For 6 hours of work that was about $100 extra that I was not aware of until you download the app and scroll through. Id rather given that to the tasker to be honest. Going forward, people probably won’t use this service as much considering it’s such a high fee and that’s less work for the taskers. Make it make sense for everyone in the mix.

We didn't start communication off on a good start. She had a conflict, so timing had to change. I was moving the day of and was late to meet her at the old apartment. She kept texting me asking when I was going to arrive. I was driving. I finally told her to leave and charge me as I didn't know my exact ETA and was getting frustrated. She ended up staying. When I returned to leave the keys etc., I was not impressed with the job she did. In fact, I cleaned up some additional areas. Grateful nonetheless, but it could have been done a lot better. Thanks.

Review.Titre: tasker would take longer than expected…
Review.Contenu: tasker would take longer than expected and anticipated as they are paid by hour. for 10 mins talk they will take 1 hour.Plus taskrabbit would charge a service fee per hour which can be 20 to 30 dollars

Based on my ordered items, the time for assembly will take 3 and half hours, which I agreed online. But the tasker took 4 and half hours, and the cost was calculated based on the tasker's time, which was not agreed initially.

Review.Titre: My tasker canceled ten minutes before…
Review.Contenu: My tasker canceled ten minutes before we were supposed to meet. TaskRabbit matched me with another person, but they were twice as expensive and only available 3 hours after I intended to start my task
Tasker was excellent. Don't like that there was a 3 hour minimum regardless of how long the job took and then $35 service fee that you are not aware of until you get the bill.

Review.Titre: Used Taskrabbit to book a cleaning…
Review.Contenu: Used Taskrabbit to book a cleaning service, thinking that I would be hiring a cleaner at a reasonable price.  But with Taskrabbit’s trust & service fee, it was costlier than I anticipated.  And I chose a person with five star reviews, but with the amount of work she completed in the time frame allotted, I would have gotten more for my money if I’d hired from a cleaning service.

Found the website very unfriendly. Things disappeared (parts of messages). My Tasker was excellent so it was worth persevering with the wretched website. Sometimes it is not with going through a 3rd party like this.

Review.Titre: I have used this service many times…
Review.Contenu: I have used this service many times before and it was also excellent.  The service now has some kind preservice fee that is crazy.   It not advertised as part of the price when you choose the associate for the work.  The associate I choose to change 3 electric switch's took almost 2 1/2 hours to do so.

Review.Titre: The extra fees was a surprise
Review.Contenu: The extra fees was a surprise. It should be included as an addition $$ to the hourly rate so it is clear and up front. The work performed by the handyman was good but I ended up paying more with fees than if I would have contracted a licensed plumber directly.

Review.Titre: I think the task should have taken less…
Review.Contenu: I think the task should have taken less time as we had the same furniture assembly with a different company assembled it in less than an hour!

Review.Titre: The person I connected with texted me…
Review.Contenu: The person I connected with texted me in English. I assumed she would be the person coming to my house. Instead, she sent someone else, one with a tough time communicating in English. It seems as though the person who was my Tasker was subcontracting work by sending another person.

Review.Titre: While the platform is user friendly…
Review.Contenu: While the platform is user friendly while requesting for work, but there is no if the task is accepted etc. also there is no way for the user to review the hours the actual work is done .The platform charges are per hour of work which is not at all acceptable. And the fees are not clearly mentioned upfront.Just curious the platform fees is so high to be per hour based. I would use this service if the platform charge is per task .Charging 50% charge as platform fee is too much

A professional technician contacted me. He was on time and very knowledgeable. But we only had a meeting. No estimate.right now he’s very busy. The only time he can start the project is next year ( January 2024). He spent about 15-20 minutes at my place. I was charged over $70 the next day. There’s no place to communicate with representatives to respond that that task has not began/ has not been completed.

Review.Titre: Good Assembly but Miscommunication in Payment
Review.Contenu: Tasker did a good job assembling the items from IKEA.  Taking off 2 Stars for miscommunication about payment. Tasker extended the job to a second day without my knowledge and after I paid him in cash for an additional task he agreed to you.  When asked he said he canceled task but did not.  In the end, I paid twice for the same work.  Taskrabbit customer service is horrible and could not resolve the issue.

The guy that intalled my wardrobe was wonderful. When I booked him, the price was $28 an hour. The total bill was supposed to be about $190 and instead I my credit card was charged $263!! That is a big diffrence. I don't like surprises like that.

I've only used the service once. I was very puzzled and unhappy that there is no real descriotion of your company, how its organized. Easy to find information about your taskrabbiters licensing, etc. What you really offer  in "Happiness" promise. All your descriptions are airy and blithe. Honestly, I wouldn't have used your service if I wasn't so desperate. I had to google the company and read articles to even have a clue about you.  That  said, the tasker that helped with my move was excellent

I scheduled jobs for two locations and it looks like  both takers accepted and then later declined. So it’s not very easy and people don’t get to see if the takers have good or poor follow-through after scheduled

Review.Titre: Too expensive but I was impressed by…
Review.Contenu: Too expensive but I was impressed by the work performed.

Inconsistency among providers .. 1st guy was a dud but the 2nd provider was a gem .  Not sure how you weed thru the lists other than use a ‘super tasked’. .  Price is not a good indicator as my first guy was double the price of the second ..

Review.Titre: My tasker was very good, fees were nuts.
Review.Contenu: My tasker was very good. He completed the task in a reasonable amount of time. He was careful and did a quality job. However, the price was way too high. I had no idea there were extra fees tacked on to the hourly rate. And the fees were high. I spent about 30% more than I expected. Will not use TaskRabbit again.

Review.Titre: The guy I hired was very lazy.
Review.Contenu: The guy I hired was very lazy.Since it was under an order of access supervised by NYPD cops they didn’t let us work for more than ten minutes (10mns) so actually your guy’s presence wasn’t needed for more than 10mns

Review.Titre: Great service IF you have hundreds of extra dollars to burn.  Sadly, I do not.
Review.Contenu: The process was easy and the assembly was fine. However, it took several hours longer than the anticipated time estimate (which resulted in more money) AND I was not aware that there would be additional costs added on by Taskrabbit in addition to the hourly rate.  These additional costs totaled ~ $150.00!!!!

Review.Titre: Job was good but not unique to Taskrabbit / fee is insane when there are other services
Review.Contenu: Job was good. Trust and Security fee (33% of the rate, scaling with each hour) caused me to delete my account.

Review.Titre: The hourly rate was heavily inflated…
Review.Contenu: It was not the tasker rates I’m complaining about they were reasonable it was all the extra add ons that were not part of the quote it amounted to over $100 which is not acceptable

My first Tasker was a no-show even when I reached out 30 minutes prior and then continued too for an additional 30 minutes post appointment time. I was able tonreschedule with someone available the same day but it was not convenient amd did cost a bit more. The new Tasker was great and I rated him such.
Great service and my Tasker was awesome...BUT the cost was prohibitive!

Review.Titre: There were fees charged to the total…
Review.Contenu: There were fees charged to the total that were not communicated on the app or with the person completing the task. When I asked the tasker they said at least they didn’t drag out the job. The job was completed so that’s good. I would be worried to use the app again because it feels like an open tab with my credit card. I hit no response from the customer service because they said it was too soon.

I like being able to find help for tasks. I have had a lot of issues with no-shows, last minute cancelations, and lateness! The booking fee is also very high, especially when the taskers aren't the most reliable. The work done is usually good, but sometimes I feel like it's purposely dragged out to get more hours/money.

Review.Titre: Tasker was awesome, Taskrabbit fees were crazy
Review.Contenu: The Tasker himself was awesome! Finished my job beautifully and efficiently. Would definitely hire again. That said a nearly 40% “trust and support fee” is ASTRONOMICAL. I don’t object to paying for the app, I don’t object to paying into an “insurance” fund to cover bad experiences, but 40% is absurd. Had the task rabbit fed been a flat fee or even a more reasonable 20-25% I wouldn’t have minded. But 40% is crazy town. I will be shopping for a less costly booking service  in the future.

Review.Titre: My experience with the tasker was fabulous.  It's the app that's the problem.…
Review.Contenu: My experience with the tasker was great.  When I called to let him know that the tasker that he was suppose to work with had cancelled and that none of the other taskers that task rabbit said were available at the time previously arranged for my job were available, he told me he could handle the job and would bring an assistant.  He arrived on time and did an excellent job.My problem is with the app itself.  I was notified the day of the job a couple of hours before he was to arrive that my tasker had cancelled, but the app says no problem this other tasker is available to do your job.  Just confirm.  When I confirm, I am then told sorry he isn't available.  Try one of these other taskers.  When I try those, I can't even check availability for the day of my job.  Since the task involved two taskers, changing to a different day would be complicated.  I was just lucky that the second tasker was so helpful and also able to handle the job.I also had a lot of trouble hiring 2 taskers, even though I was told I needed two.  Once I hired the first, the system wouldn't allow me to search for a second person available on the same day and time.  It took two conversations with live chat customer assistance to get the second person confirmed.  I had a lot of trouble just getting the first person to understand my problem.  As much as I liked the tasker I did work with I will probably not use task rabbit again because of the complexity and the unreliability of scheduling a tasker.

Review.Titre: Very difficult to find someone that…
Review.Contenu: Very difficult to find someone that wants to do the project proposed. Went through four taskers before finding someone. The first three backed out at the last minute. Very inconvenient process and very time consuming. The person that ultimately performed the work was very professional and did a great job.

Review.Titre: Taskrabbit user fees are getting out of…
Review.Contenu: Taskrabbit user fees are getting out of hand. Also, I was charged for a full hours work when the Tasker was here less than 10 minutes. I think that is completely unfair as past Taskrabbit employees have charge me per 15 minute increments. Needless to say this last experience that cost me well over $300 to put up five curtain rods and to hang a picture is definitely not worth the money. The service has gotten out of hand and too expensive. The user fees are abusive.

Review.Titre: I like being able to find a provider
Review.Contenu: I like being able to find a provider. But I do not like not having the ability to post their hours. We are sick relying on the tasker to be honest. Also taskers can easily shirk responsibilities in order to get extra hours.

Review.Titre: The taskrabbit fee ended up being…
Review.Contenu: The taskrabbit fee ended up being outrageously high and not justified. Coming in around 30% of the project cost is not appropriate.  I will hesitate to use their platform again and suggest other to pay close attention to the fees they plan to attach to projects.

Review.Titre: Would be better if the taskers could be…
Review.Contenu: Would be better if the taskers could be able to communicate before hand off the task or at least put specifics for what they can do.  And even after chatting they must be able to communicate how much time it will take before they take on the task.

Review.Titre: good job assembling; really messy though
Review.Contenu: already filled out - good job w/ the time and assembly but made a giant mess of packaging and parts (screws, etc) and did not clean any of that up. Also did not attach the wardrobe to the wall - just left w/o saying anything. I would have told him where we wanted it and had him affix it.

Review.Titre: A TEACHING MOMENT OF GOOD ADVICE.
Review.Contenu: I was pleased with the work done for me at a price i could afford. Unfortunately, all of my tasks could not be met due to lack of proper equipment to get it done.  However, I was given good advice to ask for a person that has "drill hammer" that drills into a cemented type ceiling. Great to know in the future when I would need this work to be completed

Review.Titre: He was a very nice man
Review.Contenu: He was a very nice man, but he lacked the proper tools to complete the job. It is difficult to drill holes into brick and masonry, but he was only able to hang 2 signs in 2.5 hours. I had another Tasker hang 5 signs a year ago on the same building in less than an hour.
The tasker was awesome, but I dunno about TR fees, probably wouldn't use again

Review.Titre: The tasker was fine, Taskrabbit’s extra fees weren’t.
Review.Contenu: The person I hired was fine but charging $21.75 per hour on top of his fee is ridiculous. A vetting fee makes perfect sense but charging 50% PER HOUR on top of what the tasker charges is TOO MUCH!

The good news: I was happy with the promptness and quality of work from the guy I hired.The bad news: I initially thought your "fee" was for covering administration and the worker's background check or whatever. No problem. But I was SHOCKED to see it got added to every hour of work duration! That's ridiculous. Will not be doing this again.More bad news: it was nearly impossible to figure out how to pay the guy through your app. If anything, that should be the easiest. No option to customize a tip amount either when I finally figured it out. Overall: Waaaay too hard to conclude the transaction, although easy enough to start one.

Review.Titre: Our Tasker was great the fees are HUGE!
Review.Contenu: Our tasker was great and really got us out of a bind.  The portion that goes to Task Rabbit is astronomical! The site isn't always the easiest to use and the totals including the task rabbit portion of the fee is not clear when a bid is offered.

Review.Titre: Task Rabbit Fees are exponentially high!
Review.Contenu: The communication between the "Helper" and I was great and he did a good job! BUT, the more than 20% Task Rabbit fees are much higher than expected and so for that I won't use the service again.

Task rabbit is to expensive if I didn’t need my shelf to be mounted ASAP I would had found someone else cheaper. It was a 10 min job that cost me over a 100 dollars which isn’t okay. I appreciate the work, but won’t be using the services again.
Guy was kind of weird, he said he had a hearing disability so it was hard communicating with him. Job took longer than expected but he was nice for the most part.

Review.Titre: I wanted to love it. But it stressed me out
Review.Contenu: I thought I had booked a tasker. After 10pm the first tasker I booked for “$17 an hour” (after he confirmed he could do it earlier in the day) all of a sudden said his rate was over 3 times that. It felt like a bait and switch because he knew that everyone that was available at that late of notice had a similar rate. With less than 24 hours to book someone else I had to pay a much higher rate to find a tasker last minute after he gave me the runaround. That tasker was amazing, but the whole process felt weird up until then.   I don’t really trust it anymore And I wanted to love it.

Review.Titre: The fees are not straightforward or…
Review.Contenu: The fees are not straightforward or made clear before scheduling. The fees are too high (35%), making using this service not an option.Edit: true, there is a tiny $$/hr when you go to book your task. I had estimated my task to take about an hour but it took longer due to traffic. So when I got the final bill I was shocked. Billing a “trust fee” per hour seems arbitrary.  Why would a two hour service require more trust fees than a 5 hour service? Adding an hourly fee, especially one as significant as $21 per hour, makes no sense. I had also clicked on the “i” link to read more about the service fee and nothing was mentioned there about it being hourly.

The app worked well, and I found a handyman that I was happy with.  But the add-on fee of 36% by TaskRabbit to the handyman's rate seems exorbitant. It's a real disincentive to finding workers through the app.

Review.Titre: Your computer program doesn't work very…
Review.Contenu: Your computer program doesn't work very well. So far I've booked 2 tasks both of the dates were initially canceled, leaving me to need to change a lot of plans.

Review.Titre: Difficulty getting to right taskerFound negotiating to find and…
Review.Contenu: Found negotiating to find and communicate with the right tasker challenging. Felt very lucky to have hit on excellent person but am not sure I would be so lucky next time. Am elderly and find the automated approach challenging.

Review.Titre: The app is good. The extra charges are not.
Review.Contenu: The app is good. The service is good. Very professional. I was not happy with the surcharge on every hour. I can understand a service charge on each job, but not every hour of work. That’s really out line in my opinion,

Review.Titre: Quality of work was good, however the charge ended up being more than originally quoted.
Review.Contenu: The quality of work was very good, however I was charged for 2 hrs of service, that actually took less than 1 hour

Review.Titre: I needed to have furniture taken to the…
Review.Contenu: I needed to have furniture taken to the local Goodwill who advertised that they utilize taskrabbit for pick ups. I am out of town. I booked 2 men and Goodwill refused to take the items. The items had to go to the dump. The cost of the dump and 2 men was almost $600!!  I was stunned! I think that in the future taskrabbit needs to contact Goodwill prior to the drop off. I had assumed that taskrabbit partnered with Goodwill and all details would be worked out.

Review.Titre: I like a lot about it
Review.Contenu: I like a lot about it, up front prices, people who want to work and a selection of experiences. The one thing I dislike is the additional fee that is tacked on. Most people on this are now out of my price range. I need to save up to use it now.

Our first time using Taskrabbit. Had small-small job consisting of moving one king-size mattress, 2 lightweight twin bed frames from our house downstairs to out house upstairs.  First tasker reported he was running late and then subsequently cancelled.  Second tasker had 2 hour minimum and he was here less than 10 minutes.  I think we live too far from the taskrabbits.

Review.Titre: Company charges too much $$ on fees and…
Review.Contenu: Company charges too much $$ on fees and additional charges.
Well, I love the concept of Taskrabbit, and the door-to-door assistance, I was not impressed with the service provided

Review.Titre: Your agent did an excellent job with…
Review.Contenu: Your agent did an excellent job with the furniture assembly over 2 days. However, he arrived 2-3 hours later than the scheduled appointment time, causingnus some trouble innplanning our days. On his first day, he seemed taken aback by the task at hand, as if he was unaware of the specific furniture he was supposed to assemble.

Cost a lot, like the same amount as the cost of the items that I got from Ikea. The first tasker (Janet) I made a scheduled cancelled twice. She did not consider the value of time for the costumer. The second tasker that I got was very efficient but his hourly rate cost more than my hourly rate. So if somebody is trying to save, better do it yourself.

It took several cancelations from Taskers until I finally got a Tasker to actually keep their appointment and do the work.  While the Tasker himself was wonderful, doing an excellent job on our repair work, the problem remains with the other task I still need to find someone to do. I am not satisfied with all the Taskrabbit cancelations and unresponsiveness.

The $40.25 Trust & Support Fee is ridiculous. There is no indication of this fee anywhere in the quote. You're only given an estimate in advance, which you must assume it's dependent on the actual time spent on the task.This is seriously misleading at best.

I really like how easy it is to schedule service.  The workers have been prompt in their responses and work has been completed.  The fee to use the service is apparently based on the hourly rate of the worker.  I don't feel that it should be this extreme.  It causes a job much more expensive than it should be.

Review.Titre: Loved the service and our helper hired…
Review.Contenu: Loved the service and our helper hired was awesome but the fees you tack on are too high.

Review.Titre: It was easy to schedule an appointment…
Review.Contenu: It was easy to schedule an appointment using the web. Mr. Mohammed was very professional and did an excellent job assembling the Love-Sac Sactional sofa. My only comment is you should not charge $25/hour (approx) your service fee, in addition to hourly rate charged by Mohammed! You should only charge one $25 for your service!

Review.Titre: I signed up for two taskers and one…
Review.Contenu: I signed up for two taskers and one canceled leaving quite a load for the one tasker that did show up. It was a costly day as a result

The company is good. I guess I didn’t look closely enough at the bios because I chose a tasker who mostly does hauling and moving and I needed assembling. It was the wrong guy. He was lovely and professional but should probably not have accepted the request. I would suggest categorizing your tasters by job type

Review.Titre: So the tasker  I FINALLY booked was…
Review.Contenu: So the tasker  I FINALLY booked was great! I booked him again BUT it was very frustrating trying to book someone: one tasker never responded and I wasted two hours waiting; the next tasker went back and forth for another hour then declined the jobI was only able to book someone by paying a two hour guarantee for a 45 minute job so it has been extremely expensive.

Task Rabbit is something of a mixed bag. Their software lacks all kinds of features that would have made scheduling my task a lot easier. Perhaps not coincidentally, this lack of features caused them to offer me only a single Tasker, who charged about 4 times as much as their lower priced competitors; fortunately I was able to bypass this nonsense and pick someone else.They've "punished" me for using their services by subscribing me to "Taskrabbit's Email Marketing Channel", and I don't yet know what else they may have subscribed me to, or whether their unsubscribe link does anything useful. But the Tasker I hired did a great job, and I'd hire him again in a heartbeat. And a service like this is invaluable e.g. for older people who simply can't assemble furniture themselves.

As a customer, we get penalized a one hour's fee if we cancel an appointment within 24 hours of the appointment time...but taskers can cancel anytime. I had 2 taskers cancel on me last minute back to back on separate days. I had certain things scheduled around these appointments and had to work around them, and then they canceled for no reason and I had to rework it all again. Its really quite unfair as a paying customer to allow taskers to use us that way. I should have been offered a discount on my last appointment due to the previous 2 cancelations.

Review.Titre: Great work done by provider, Ridiculous fees by TaskRabbit
Review.Contenu: Provider did a good jobWhat is Ridiculous is the trust and support fee. 37% charge of actual work? for referral? I will use other sites like Thumbtack in the future. At this rate it is better to use yellow pages :)Also time for using this site.

Review.Titre: Was able to find electrical help after…
Review.Contenu: Was able to find electrical help after few cancellations. The one I found charged me twice since he got one more person with him. He did not mention this before he visited home. Experience would have been great if I knew beforehand.

The contractor was careful, attentive, courteous, and did not waste time. The pricing however was confusing, and always is because Task Rabbit adds on its fees and it always comes out to way more than what is advertised as the hourly rate. Which is why I hesitate and rarely use this service.

Review.Titre: left with a half put together couch…
Review.Contenu: I disliked that he did not verify that he had all the parts to assemble the ikea couch first!  Instead, he left me with a half put together couch with missing parts that needed to be ordered and worse- put the couch together without the covers on that need to be attached with each piece so I had to take it all apart and reassemble it myself.  I will never use this service again!

I was very happy with the work done by Fatima and her daughter. They were wonderful and professional. The negatives - I did not appreciate the extra charges. The fee for TaskRabbit was high and I did not know I would be charged for her cleaning supplies. Although she asked me if I prefer her to use her products or mine, there was no mention of the additional $24 to use hers.

Review.Titre: Sorry, Jose won’t be able to complete
Review.Contenu: I booked multiple taskers. After a few chats describing my needs they just canceled the booking and I was informed that I had to find new taskers. It was very weird. The application should require them to explain why they are unable to the job or at least warn the customer that they’re no longer available or interested in the job. Also, the additional fees you all charge that have increased tremendously are ridiculous.

Review.Titre: woulda been a better overall rating
Review.Contenu: woulda been a better overall rating, except as a first-time user, at the end of the process -time to pay- i find out that I am also contributing% to maintain YOUR website and workforce. I like the Advertisers Pay model better.  so not only do I pay for the HandyMan services,  taxes, I am also paying for this white page I am typing on.
The actual work was fine to include cost.  I think the additional fee from TaskRabbit is too high.

Review.Titre: Please rethink your customer service! I think the system needs to be…
Review.Contenu: I think the system needs to be improved. The app required me to give my credit card information and requirements right away and then I chose a worker, selecting the available hours listed. A half hour later someone repsonded they were not available! Finally someone accepted the job then on the day of our move we got a message saying "cancelled." This is unacceptable and unprofessional. We tried 3 times, got cancellations and the last person did show up but a half hour early and we weren't prepared. He acted very entitled and expected we would drop everything and start to suit his schedule. I would hesitate before using TR again and would not recommend to friends/family.

Review.Titre: What I dislike is the fees Task rabbit…
Review.Contenu: What I dislike is the fees Task rabbit is starting to charge now they're crazy high. I understand needing to have money to run a website but some of your fees are just out of this world high. And some of the Taskers are looking for some ridiculous hourly rates and demanding minimum 2 hours

Review.Titre: Very Convenient But Expensive after Charges
Review.Contenu: Very Convenient and Easy to find a Handymen. But Charged $30 as "Trust & Support Fee" is too much. this made me think about using TaskRabbit again. For sure I am going to find another Alternative that charges reasonable fees.

Review.Titre: TaskRabbit could benefit from some improvements
Review.Contenu: 1) The trust and service fee is very  high.  I was also surprised that it changed after I made the initial booking.2) The website isn't intuitive.  It wasn't clear to me whether I could cancel a task once I had booked it.  The information about cancelations needs to be better communicated.

I like Task rabbit however, I was charged for a reimbursement fee of $100.- which, I do not understand. I even helped with moving a few things including a mattress down 3 flights of stairs and all these add-on charges doubled the agreed upon price. Reeks of scamming the clients.Thank you
I really dont like the trust and support fee being so high. It will definitely deter me from using this app

Review.Titre: Taskers can fail to show & you’re just out of luck
Review.Contenu: I hired two Taskers. One was great. The other didn’t show up. The project (moving large and heavy furniture) required a second person. I ended up paying the first guy while I waited for someone to show up as a last minute hire. TaskRabbit didn’t do anything to make up for the guy that didn’t show. Not even an apology email. When I contacted them, they told me I wouldn’t get charged for the person that didn’t show up. Of course I wouldn’t. That would be crazy. They shouldn’t have done something (discount, credits). This was my first time using TaskRabbit.The “Trust & Support Fee” is also excessive. Almost 40% on top of what you pay the Taskers. I understand they have to make money but almost 40% feels excessive.

The communication and ease of scheduling prior to the visit was excellent. The tasker reached out immediately and asked what the job was. And I communicated the IKEA furniture they would be assembling. They arrived on time. They were friendly, and worked independently asking questions only when necessary such as specific placement in the room, and about some pieces we received that we damaged in some way. The specific concern was the estimated time (4 hours) and related cost ($450 or so) was severely underestimated. The tasker spent 8 hours on the job, and we were charged over $1000. That was a huge surprise to us. It is for that reason only that we will never hire Taskrabbit again.

Review.Pseudo: People good tech not so much
Review.Titre: People good, tech not so much
Review.Contenu: The tasker providing service gets a 4.5. Down from 5.0 only because he had to re-schedule which required me to change some of my schedule.The web site works reasonably well, but could be better. It looks like a mobile app migrated to a bigger screen. The company really pushes the use of their smart phone app. In my experience, the Android app just doesn't work. I tried troubleshooting, but no luck. Also, it's not my job. Very frustrating.

I booked a painter and he was a no-show twice. I did rebook with another painter (who was great), but I was never able to rate the first painter. So essentially, he gets away with being a no-show with no consequence to his profile. No other users will ever know that he is not dependable. He has probably done this before to others, but I would never know because of this platform flaw.

Hidden charge. Christian your tech was excellent and knowledgeable. But disappointed when I got my recipe and found a charge for $38.01 (Trust & Support Fee) which was never mention when I book your service. It should have been stated at that time.

Review.Titre: Taskrabbit charges way too much in…
Review.Contenu: Taskrabbit charges way too much in support fees—I can understand a fixed charge/finder’s fee, but per hour? Seriously? Once set up, cleaner is doing the actual work, not Taskrabbit.

Review.Titre: Not up front about charges & fees.
Review.Contenu: The person which did my task was very kind, stayed on task ,& did a great job, however I feel like Task Rabbit prices were very misleading. You charged me more per hour on the website than my Tasker charges per hour.  On top of it, I did not know there would be a "trust & support" fee until the job was finished. The over charge & hidden fee made me feel like I was lied to. You should be up front & honest about your fees & charges. If you were honest, I would've given more stars. The only reason I gave 3 stars is because the Johnathon was a good worker.

This was my first time using Task. I needed help moving between cities and scheduled one Tasker at my origin city and a different Tasker at my destination city. It was unclear to me when a booking is confirmed. Then, the Tasker at my origin canceled at the last minute and I was left without any help. However, the Tasker at my destination was on time and very efficient.

Review.Titre: The first two taskers scheduled for my…
Review.Contenu: The first two taskers scheduled for my project canceled last minute. One kept me waiting three and a half hours, kept saying he was coming then suddenly canceled. Major waste of my time. Third time we scheduled a tasker he was on time and did a good job.

We really liked our tasker, Edi. He had a great personality and did a great job. If this review was solely based on Edi, it would be five stars. However, the fees added on above what Edi  charged made our bill much higher than we expected. For that reason we may not use the service again.

Review.Titre: The trust fee is a bit excessive
Review.Contenu: The trust fee is a bit excessive. Perhaps a one-time fee per task, instead of added per hour.

Review.Titre: Surprised that Tasker can cancel last minute without penalty
Review.Contenu: I was surprised that the tasker cancel less than an hour before job time. He could not find the location on GPS and text me but I was in school and not allowed to respond to msg. In the system is my address but no apartment name. Also if I do a cancellation within 24 hrs I am charged for 1 hr, but a tasker can cancel without penalty. This is not a good system!
taskers overcharge on hours spent working and also add additional charges. don't know if tasters are a honest bunch to be honest. also Tasker lied on what was completed after the job.

Review.Titre: I liked the app and the concept
Review.Contenu: I liked the app and the concept.  I didn't have the best experience with the person I hired.  He tried to double the price upon arrival even though I described the job exactly.  I also provided pictures prior to him coming to my home.  He agreed to do the work on the original price but it left me feeling uneasy about the job.

Review.Titre: The prices are way too expensive to…
Review.Contenu: The prices are way too expensive to assemble Ikea furniture and not all taskers are well versed with Ikea furniture. It’s a shame that Ikea doesn’t offer a service to assemble their own furniture.

Taskrabbit fees are horrible! The process to select and book someone for the task is great and extremely helpful. The person I booked with was professional, efficient, and did a fantastic job! Paying the fees per hour is ridiculous and I will probably not use this service again because of it.  I give the three stars because of the ease of use and my task was completed.

Review.Titre: David was exceptional; corporate fee hidden
Review.Contenu: David, our task rabbit person, was superb. His work and demeanor were spot on! I would hire him again without hesitation. He was also very clear re: his fees and I paid them gladly along with a tip for going above and beyond. Your ( the task rabbit company) additional fee of approximately $41 was not clearly stated, on the other hand. I was surprised by it, and not in a good way.

Review.Titre: The tasker was very familiar with IKEA…
Review.Contenu: The tasker was very familiar with IKEA products and was very quick to assemble the unit in under 30 mins. For him, I would give 5 stars.The reason I am giving 4 stars has to do with TaskRabbit, the organization.  I like that the Tasker can set his/her own hourly rates because they should be fairly compensated.  I can understand the additional fee imposed by the organization.  What I find objectionable is that you are asked to give a tip for a job well done when I feel that the hourly rate is more than sufficient.  By not adding a tip implies that the job was not well done which is not the case.

Review.Titre: New Taskers Need Facts Not Irrelevant Matters
Review.Contenu: Among a small sampling of contractors I curated I used a yardstick of experience, amount and types of skills, and personal presentation to pick my tasker.  My advice for improving taskers' profiles is to stick to the facts:  what you can do for the customer, forget about:  you need to schedule the appointment so I won't be traveling on my motorcycle; that can be taken care of after you've been hired.  In my mind you just placed an impediment to my hiring you.  There are taskers on the site who say virtually nothing about what they can do.  If you're new you can still point to what you're good at and talk about things like commitment and focus; that's something every customer wants to hear.  If you haven't already, you could mention these points as the difference between being hired or not.  I have an upbeat attitude, things of a positive nature, all important if you're new.
Prompt response to request. Helper good at making the most of the allotted time. Would use helper in future.

Review.Titre: Deny and his wife has is so professional even tho they aren't fluent with their English but they understood well,they were so humble and on time,he follow thru with me right until they got to my house
Review.Contenu: This is such a good idea to think this thru and implement such useful techniques Thanks to you guys,no favors ask just have your money
She did a great job! Had to take a star off because it was complicated at the start trying to set everything up with her, but I'd use her again for sure!!

Saed was excellent.  Showed up early, and worked VERY quickly.  Very easy to book my appointment online.  My only complaint is the fees.  That was 25% of the actual charge!   But pretty satisfied overall.

Review.Titre: Watch out for the added fee.
Review.Contenu: The Installation Pro was great. I've hired him before and am more than satisfied with his work.  What got my goat was the additional $45.00, whatever fee.  I am on a limited income and that means I do without.
On time and very professional. I will schedule again in the future.
The Knowledge and efficiency of the technician was remarkable.  Although the service took longer than anticipated and therefore increased the expense, the service was well worth it!

Review.Titre: excellent work, but a bit slow ..
Review.Contenu: easy to set up and use Task Rabbit.  Worker was friendly, competent and cleanup everything.  Only downside was that he was slower than I expected, so labor was a bit higher than expected.

Review.Titre: Tasker was great, billing not so much.
Review.Contenu: My tasker was very helpful. However the $15/hr fee charged by TaskRabbit on top of the tasker's fee was unexpected. I figured there would be an admin fee or something on top of the cost, but $15/hr?! That seems excessive.

My tasker was great but I don’t like that you can’t talk to them and confirm extra fees without booking the task. I needed help with a move and my taker advertised a truck but I could not contact him to discuss what kind of truck he had or the fees charged to use it without booking and putting a hold on my card

Review.Titre: Taskers great; Task Rabbit fee high
Review.Contenu: All your taskers are wonderful.  But your $15.20/hour fee on top of their rate is too high.  And why would your fee be per hour?  There is no extra work for you if the task takes one hour or several hours. Just one fee instead of an hourly fee would be good.  Plus you really should mention the fee before we choose a tasker.  Wish you had some cheaper taskers, too, for extremely simple tasks.  However, all works smoothly and, as I said, your taskers are terrific.

Review.Titre: The tasker was prompt and professional…
Review.Contenu: The tasker was prompt and professional and got the job done

We loved the tasker and the work they did. So 5 stars to the tasker. However we got close to not having the job done because of lack of insurance. We begged and pleaded the building super and were allowed. It would be nice if TR got some sort of collective insurance for the taskers.
The limitations of the website and customer support are pretty awful. But I found two people who did  excellent work for the furniture-moving job I had.

Review.Titre: Lovely people and they got the work…
Review.Contenu: Lovely people and they got the work done and made it fun. But billing wasn't transparent and some taskers changed rates after booking. That needs to be improved.

Review.Titre: I had a great experience considering it…
Review.Contenu: I had a great experience considering it was my first time using the service.  My person who came was punctual, friendly and knowledgeable. The only thing I didn’t like was the surprise charge of $10.95! I believe it was a Trust & Support fee that I wasn’t aware of! Apparently this fee is part of the Happiness Pledge and goes to protect customers and training.  I will use Task Rabbit again regardless

The tasker was great but I think it’s a bit expensive. The taskers can just move slow on a job to rack up hours. Also, I believe the trust and reliability fee was too expensive. But hey, that’s New York. Again, the tasker did a great job.
My tasker was GREAT I have booked with him more than once and refereed him to friends . I didn’t like the new trust and safe fee thats like 22$ on top the fact his prices went up
While I like that the company provides plenty of services and decent work, the charges are extremely high and not affordable for students at all.

RJ was great.  Very friendly and helpful. Did not get my full allotted time as RJ was concerned about next task job in another town. RJ came back (with another person requested) and helped  move bigger items but had to pay Cash App for extra time and person, instead  of handling everything through the app. I would recommend getting all information from client about what all may be needed for job (dolly or extra person) before service time.

Review.Titre: TaskRabbit was able to provide the…
Review.Contenu: TaskRabbit was able to provide the service I needed at the end. At one point, I had several cancelations from TaskRabbit until Souhail H. responded to my task request at the very last minute. He was able to assemble my IKEA bed frame with storage and a standing desk. Overall, Souhail did a great job where he was very fast with his time and friendly.

Great plumber! Wonderful person, work attitude, quick access to assistance.My only criticism is that the TaskRabbit app on my phone would not let me enter a tip or a review--it just defaulted to a thank you for receiving my input.  I didn't get to tip him or praise him.
Very easy to schedule and communicate with the person doing my task. They were an hour late but did keep me aware of where they were. The task was done even better than I had anticipated
Overall it was great. The only thing I would say could be better is the messaging system. Getting a text and then having to follow a link isn’t very efficient. But not terrible

Review.Titre: Easy to use just one suggestion
Review.Contenu: The people on task rabbit seemed very creditable. The app was easy to use and the reviews look real. I didn't like I couldn't chat about the project and price with the Tasker before booking with them. When I canceled with a Tasker it was cause we didn't agree on the final price and that wasn't an option to choose during the cancelation process. Even so I will use this app again and again.
Some complication to estimate and actual pricing for assembling task. it need specific

Review.Titre: The last Tasker I had was very friendly…
Review.Contenu: The last Tasker I had was very friendly and helpful - but unfortunately when he got here he couldn't complete the work because I needed some additional parts that I'll have to get from the hardware store.  It would be helpful to be able to set up a consultation so the tasker knows what's involved and whether the job can be completed.  In this instance I paid for 2 hours of time and still don't have the work done.

Excellent service by our taskers. Reason for the 4 star review instead of 5?is the trust and support charge. It’s not clear how that is levied when looking at the rates. It should mention it’s hourly, not a fee.

Review.Titre: I have used Task Rabbit twice now and…
Review.Contenu: I have used Task Rabbit twice now and have experienced very positive results with the person selected. The only negative I have with Task Rabbit is that the Task Rabbit fee is excessive and will cause me to think about not using Task Rabbit in the furure.
My experience with the assembler Michelle was phenomenal. What the site needs is to show the additional fees up front. It’s like they are trying to hide them.Overall I was happy
Prompt response. Nice results

Review.Titre: It did not start off as a great…
Review.Contenu: It did not start off as a great experience. I had scheduled and confirmed with a tasker. Thought I was all set to move forward with my project only to have him cancel after confirming. I was lucky to have found Otis whom came in right away and put everything together without issue. I will be using him again and he gets 5 stars for his service communication and completion of job in a good amount of time.

Review.Titre: Good App Exorbitant Fees to Use
Review.Contenu: The app is easy to use and the people I have hired have always been professional, on time, and very helpful. The one downside is the fee that Taskrabbit charges per hour - it seems exorbitant. For instance, I needed help moving something, and the tasker had a two hour minimum, so even though it only took an hour, I paid for two, which is fine, but then I had to pay taskrabbit an extra $25 per hour - why? What are they doing that wouldn't be covered by a flat rate per task?
On time, professional and friendly.No solution for packaging material. Now, one week later, I am still cutting cardboard to meter into our household recycling bin.

Our Tasker was wonderful. Gave him 5 stars. The Task Rabbit app could be easier to navigate chats.  I was also charged over $20 per hour for administrative fee. Far too expensive and unjustified.  I will be avoiding Task Rabbit for that reason

I was remolding my bathroom. After removing the tile floor revealed problems with the subfloor, I turned to Taskrabbit for a solution. I had a very limited time before the next trade was scheduled to come in, but the floor had to be fixed first. Taskrabbit did not disappoint. Found the tasker I was looking for. He was available. He did just what I asked and did it well. I also like that I get to see all the  choices cand only contact who I choose. Will use again.

Review.Titre: TaskRabbit is a Good Emergency Service
Review.Contenu: It's a good service for finding quick short-term job repair assistance.  Communication by email and text much appreciated for the hearing disabled.  The tasker was reliable and did a good job.  However, I did not care for the Trust and Service Fee applied to the bill.  It was almost a third of the billing.  I skimmed the service agreement and there's a long list of stuff TaskRabbit accepts absolutely no responsibility for.

I wish I could give 4.5. I reserve 5 for zero things pointed out. The job done was amazing. We did notice the inside top rim of our toilet was still dirty, but everything else was spotless. We were also in the mist of doing our own de-cluttering and cleaning and we appreciate the non-intrusivness and "let's get straight down to business" approach. Very appreciate of the effort and in many ways, went above and beyond.

Review.Titre: The service from the tasker was…
Review.Contenu: Great service, however...The service from the tasker was stellar. The use of technology to shield users experience was also great.  the additional fee charged to users was not really understandable.  It felt like one of these obscure added fees.  It was very high and it is difficult for the user to plan for the extra cost added at payment.  There should be a sample before hand explaining what the final cost will be.
Great experienceOnly thing is added code of Task rabbit which is not accounted for and is a lot.

Taskrabbit is great in principle. However, sometimes it’s a little hit or miss with the Tasker. I’m not sure how some Taskers become elite who aren’t so great. But overall, my experience was positive. It’s an affordable option usually, although when they’re doing electric or things like that, sometimes I worry what their background is, and what kind of licensure they do or don’t have.

Levi brought a helper and they worked well together. We have a switchback stair and a large cabinet had to moved downstairs on hardwood floors. We added couple things while they were here and they took it in stride as well. Would recommend based on my experience with them!

The experience was great because the tasker was great.  That said, I like the app because it showed me reviews and allowed me choices based on other customer experiences.  I would have preferred knowing the extra fee on top of the tasker’s hourly fee/minimum before choosing.  This did not make a difference but I always prefer transparency up front.  Good app will use again. Thank you!
Was a good experience. The person I found wasn't able to do 100% of the jobs I needed done.  however it was for very cheap.

The web site was easy to use and the person I hired was extraordinarily good and responsive.,What surprised me was the fairly sizable trust fee that was tacked on to the person’s hourly rate by Task Rabbit. I think more transparency on the all in cost per hour is called for. I did not contest it as I’m sure it’s in the fine print somewhere but wash not readily evident to me at the time of booking.,

Review.Titre: GREAT referrals but watch out for the fees.
Review.Contenu: I'm finding GREAT referrals on TaskRabbit.  I'll keep coming back BUT.... you never see the TaskRabbit fees until WAY at the end.  Wow... sometimes those are a surprise.  However... the quality of the service I've been receiving is outweighing the fees.

Review.Titre: The 1st use was great, fees are high
Review.Contenu: The task rabbit I used was really outstanding. I have only used task rabbit once. However, the fees for task rabbit service are unusually high, being hourly instead of a flat fee. It makes me choose less hours of work. Still, it was a great experience. I have no other task rabbit jobs so far, I can only compare it to services like Thumbtack for looking up workers. In that respect I'm going down one star just for the fees.

Review.Titre: James was prepared for hooking up my…
Review.Contenu: James was prepared for hooking up my Apple TV to the television. He went through many different receiver channels to find the right one. This took time to do. The second hook up was a lot easier. I would recommend James to any customer looking for satisfaction.

Price was more than expected, but that may be more of a function of Ikea underestimating the time it takes to put together certain units (i.e., wardrobes). We feel that the worker was professional and skilled, and we are very satisfied with his efforts.

I liked that I could see the different levels of experience and costs. You are also upfront about the additional fees, but I think they're exorbitant! Why charge them per hour instead of having a flat service fee!

Review.Titre: John was fantastic and did a great job
Review.Contenu: John was fantastic and did a great job.  Scheduling was not perfect since I scheduled him for 4pm and got a message from him after that (maybe 4:30?) that he wasn't going to make it till 5:30 since a previous job took longer than anticipated.  It all worked out in the end and he was unfailingly careful, polite and patient.  The job took about 1.5 hours more than I thought it would, so it was more expensive than I budgeted. I probably miscalculated the time involved and I'm glad he was careful and completed the picture hanging with care and preciseness, rather than rushing through.  I would gladly call on John again.

Review.Titre: Found a highly experienced tasker but beware of high task rabbit fees!
Review.Contenu: My experience with my first tasker was great! He got the job completed in great time! Very efficient! I’m sure I can find other great taskers but task rabbit charges an arm and a leg in fees to profit.  Not worth it for me to use this site often. Only once in a while.

The product (a bookcase from IKEA) that I invited TaskRabbit to work on, happend to be defective: on one of the shelves there are several very noticeable red spots. The assembler definitely should have noticed this, but for some reason did not bring my attention to this problem. This shelf was assembled almost at the very beginning (on step2). Now I'm filing a complaint with IKEA. Looks like they are ready to replace this shelf, but everything that has already been assembled and this work was paid to TaskRabbit, now must be disassembled back to the initial phase

Review.Titre: Nice process structure, what is trust and support fee?
Review.Contenu: I was pleased with procedures to contact our Tasker and the chat communication. I did assume the additional 15% trust and support fee was a tip for the Tasker, and was puzzled by the option to include a tip after payment. I want to support my Tasker- he did a great job. But would like clarification as to the purpose of and who gets the 15%
I liked the service .  The man was very communicative with me .  The app reminded me when they were coming .  I trusted the Taskrabbit guy . My only thing was the quote was way off.

The process was easy to find the suitable tasker. Andre was prompt and energetic. I had to give this four stars because the final bill to tack on $119 for some ridiculous protection and customer service fee is absolutely nuts. I would have to reconsider using the site for that reason alone.

Review.Titre: Tasker didn't brace the furniture to…
Review.Contenu: Tasker didn't brace the furniture to the wall.  After chatting, he agreed to come back but never did and then chat was closed.

Review.Titre: I would give my tasker 100 stars
Review.Contenu: I would give my tasker 100 stars, but an error on my part entering my address sent my tasker to the wrong apartment. You should please make sure that there are fields for street and city for the location of the task. I entered my street address but not my NYC borough, and my tasker went to Manhattan rather than Brooklyn.

I love your services however, I was recently charged $34 in addition to $90 to have someone come and remove two specialized screws out of a wall. He was there for less than five minutes! You should probably make the fee YOU charge more prominent.

Review.Titre: I was really excited about this concept…
Review.Contenu: I was really excited about this concept and booked someone for a job. He confirmed and 25 minutes out from his scheduled time texted me his ETA, which was terrific. Then 15 minutes later I receive a message from task rabbit that he could not do the job. ???When I tried to rebook, the task managers that were suggested to me were all more expensive and had a 2 hour minimum. I wan’t able to book someone until the next day. I took time of work to be home, only to be told, last minute that he would not be here.The following day my task manager was excellent! Timely, polite, respectful, and communicative. If it weren’t for the first day cancellation, I’d give 5 stars.

Review.Titre: I do not want to pay the additional fee…
Review.Contenu: I do not want to pay the additional fee of $30+ for ‘good feelings’.  I called your number immediately after seeing it  added to the bill and was on hold for over 4 minutes so I disconnected the call. Please contact me.  I was not told by IKEA that there is an added fee for the service. Just the assembly $ estimate. Josh did a good job, arrived on time, worked efficiently and neatly. Satisfied with Josh, but please reimburse the added fee to my credit card. Kind regards, Susan FosterIKEA Elvarli shelf installation

I was unaware of whatever fee the website is charging for connecting this with the assembler. Maybe I didn't read carefully enough, but they could have been more clear. The person sent to us was wonderful and I have no complaints about him.

Review.Titre: Time changed, previous customer added last-minute projects
Review.Contenu: The whole experience was great. Jessy was amazing and kept me up to date when his arrival time changed. I would have given five stars, but the customer before me added two projects to their list which impacted my schedule by 90 minutes. Wasn’t a deal breaker this time, as my schedule was flexible. That may not always be the case -

Review.Titre: Cyrus was great BUT TR app misleading
Review.Contenu: Cyrus was great!  The problem is that I selected him based on reviews but also because I had a small job that would only take 30 minutes.  His profile did not state 2 hour minimum but I was charged for 2 hours instead of 1 hour when the job only lasted 30 minutes

Review.Titre: The work was done efficiently but…
Review.Contenu: The work was done efficiently and the bookcases looked good when completed. The task rabbit said he couldn’t attach the bookcases to the wall because the studs needed to be exactly in the middle of each bookcase. This did not seem right to us but the bookcases are not attached. Let’s hope they don’t fall over. One bookcase required a cutout to accommodate a light plug. The task rabbit cut the whole in the wrong place, so we have a hole in the right place and a patched hole in the wrong place. Otherwise we appreciated the service.

Review.Titre: Watch out for tacked on chargers, which could be significant and could change your mind about whether you want to hire this person.
Review.Contenu: Tasker was great, but I think it’s somewhat slippery to advertise the already inflated rate of $50 an hour or so and then tack on an additional $20 an hour that makes $70 an hour which is a damn sight different than $50 an hour. That’s way too much for a simple cleaning job.

Review.Titre: I needed to upgrade the app and it would freeze
Review.Contenu: I needed to upgrade the app and while it would allow me to select upgrade and login it would freeze.  I finally removed the old app installed the new one and changed my password and seems to work as expected. Joe, the task person was great.

Review.Titre: The tasker was great and willing to…
Review.Contenu: The tasker was great and willing to take on another project last minute which was a huge help. I just cant figure out how to open the bottom drawers of the bed so a quick run through to check the finished product would have been helpful. Thanks!

Review.Titre: Mostly a good service with some exceptions
Review.Contenu: Mostly a good service, but you never know what you’re going to get. I’ve had taskers not show up at an appointed time and then reschedule to never show up. Sometimes you get great help and sometimes it’s a total waste of time.
The Task Rabbit was great, but the service is a little pricey. Besides paying him, there is a service charge, too.

Review.Titre: The Tasker I utilized was fantastic
Review.Contenu: The Tasker I utilized was fantastic, however, the platform needed navigation for the most simple things.  I don't even know where to write a review for my Tasker .  Help center is useless.
Our tasker, Imed, was great but I found it very difficult to book an appointment on your website.  I had to start afresh several times before successfully booking an appt.

Honest, pleasant, hard worker. When she made a mistake, she immediately owned the problem and fixed it, and then rechecked the other similar conditions in the hooks for the other hanging pictures, replacing a few with heavier hooks. I will definitely call Monica again.

Review.Titre: Excellent service to find local help…
Review.Contenu: Excellent service to find local help with small projects.  I give 4 stars as first tasker I hired flaked - the one who eventually did the job was perfect and installed my RING doorbell in 20 min!  A breeze

I found someone willing to take on my overgrown garden and I was happy all the candidates were vetted. I thought it was much better to be able to look up a person and the comments about their work, instead of just grabbing an unknown off craigslist. Will be using this app again.

Review.Titre: Taskrabbit helped me to find someone to…assemble IKEA purchase
Review.Contenu: Taskrabbit helped me to find someone to assemble my IKEA purchase.  The communication through Taskrabbit was easy and secure.  I felt the hourly rate was a bit high and the final cost was certainly more than I anticipated.

The contractor was great. However, I was unaware taskmaster fees would be so steep. I did not like that. I would like more transparency & to get an approximation of your extra fees before contracting.

Review.Titre: Only feedback would be to let the…
Review.Contenu: Only feedback would be to let the customer explain or talk. He is good and fast but he wouldn't let us finish when we were trying to explain something. Overall, he's really quick!
The service provided by Jonathan was great, really liked his work and cleanliness.The additional charge of trust and support fee is vey high and not very happy with that charge.
Tasker arrived late.  Was communicative until arrival.  Said little and was not confident about what he needed to do.  Got some things done.

Review.Titre: I'm unable to use the app because of a…
Review.Contenu: I'm unable to use the app because of a glitch in the app tells me my email is taken. So it makes it tedious to communicate with the tasker because I have to be at my computer desktop. I wish you didn't have to communicate through the website/app.Otherwise, the service is good.
I like it overall. Both taskers have been very nice and did a good job.  But, the additional fees are a bit much.
Fernando V was so nice, quick and knew what he was doing! We will definitely have him back!!
I didn't understand why we had to pay an additional hourly fee for the training, (or whatever), of our tasker. If this is necessary, shouldn't it be between the tasker and the TaskRabbit?

Review.Titre: The ease of finding a great person to…assemble furniture
Review.Contenu: The ease of finding a great person to assemble my furniture. That person was Julia who I highly recommend.The negative was that you charge way to much of a service fee and for that it may prevent me from seeking out your service again. It cost me $80.00 above and beyond the rate of the installer.

Review.Titre: Jared was great- your user interface is…
Review.Contenu: Jared was great- your user interface is difficult to useJared provided a code for a discount if I booked him again and when I made the appointment the interface stated that the code was invalid - that is not acceptable

Review.Titre: Taskrabbit is a very easy platform to…
Review.Contenu: Taskrabbit is a very easy platform to use. It's a great way to get tasks done very quickly.  One of the negatives, is the fees that are added on in addition to the hourly rates that are paid to the taskers. Other than that I would have given it 5 stars. I will use the tasker I used for other projects.  Some of the taskers don't seem to be very experienced.

Our choice of contractor was perfect. Only constructive input is the lack of transparency with additional fees with hourly rates posted. I was unaware of any additional ‘ trust’ fees until I had completed my research and made choice of individual that met my needs.
I did not appreciate the surprise $20 fee that gets added on.

The person I worked with was both professional and flexible when it came to what to install, and I would be glad to hire him again. The UX for the Taskrabbit site was a bit clunky and unintuitive, however.

Review.Titre: Easy to navigate as a first time user
Review.Contenu: Easy to navigate as a first time user.  Found a 5-star painter nearby who did great work.  A bit surprised by the additional trust fee, bumping up the hourly rate by about 25%.  Still, good to know the takers are vetted.
Terrible web site (one star) but outstanding worker who came and did the work (five stars).
Not much to say. He came on time, was efficient and did the job.

The first person who agreed to do my job was a no show and I never heard from him again. However, the second person I tried was awesome! I really should have started with someone who had many stellar ratings. Once it worked out, I thought the whole experience was worth it. Will use again!
The service Received was great. Task Rabbit sends me too many emails and messages.

Review.Titre: I don’t like the Trust and Support fee
Review.Contenu: I don’t like the Trust and Support fee.  Everything else was fine, however, that additional cost should be incorporated another way.

Review.Titre: Nice not to have to worry about things.
Review.Contenu: Hello, this is the first time I’ve ever used any type of handyman service. The app was somewhat easy. But it was a bit harder trying to find somebody who could do what I needed at a time that I needed. I work different types of hours, and trying to pick somebody who is highly rated to coincide with my time frame was more difficult than I anticipated. I did end up finding somebody who actually came out on the holiday. I was very surprised by that. He did a wonderful job that didn’t take him all day. Prices were pretty much what’s to be expected, but I was not prepared for the service fee. Especially the amount that was charged. The original amount I was OK with. But I did not realize that it was multiplying per hour. That part was not cool.I will definitely use Taskrabbit again. They took undo worry from me, which I completely appreciate!

Site was easy to use and I appreciated being able to see how experienced the taskers were, so I did not have to take a risk on a newbie.  The person I picked was available quickly and did a friendly, efficient, quality job for a fair price in less time than originally estimated.  Their cost was middle-of-the-pack.  I would definitely choose that person and TaskRabbit again if I had a need.  My only suggestion is that I would love it if you did technology assistance, which I did not see as an offered service.

Review.Titre: Rob was very professional and took the…
Review.Contenu: Rob was very professional and took the extra time to ask my wife how she wanted the cabinet he assembled setup.  Shelf locations and things like that.Excellent service

We were able to hire Taskrabbit to remotely handle assisting my Mother during a move. The service was excellent and it was a great way to provide help while not being able to be there in person. Super friendly and very helpful. They helped for 5+ hours! Amazing.

For installation of two stairway handrails, Brandon understood the task and completed it quickly.  He was also pleasant to speak with, willing to explain the situation and provided advice on options, such as the number of brackets per rail.

Review.Titre: I could schedule it for the best time…
Review.Contenu: I could schedule it for the best time that was convenient for me.  The young man Shaq was very polite and he did an excellent job putting our cabinet together.  I would recommend this company to everybody

Review.Titre: Love being able to identify excellent…
Review.Contenu: Love being able to identify excellent helpers - we have always had good experiences with Taskrabbit!  In VA and in CO!  Thank you Taskrabbit!

Nathan did an excellent job at hanging my gallery wall located in a staircase. This project would have take me hours to complete and he did it quickly. He brought all the necessary tools. I will continue to seek his assistance on my upcoming projects!

Victor was professional, efficient, clearly experienced and disciplined. He knew what he was doing and finished the job far more quickly than I thought anyone could (a 100 inch long wardrobe closet) and I know because I did two of these closets 15 years ago (and I had no interest, at age 75, to do it again.)

I needed to repair a table one of whose legs had partially collapsed making the table unusable. Milan emailed me as soon as I chose him for the job, asking for photographs of the problem. Due to this preparation, he showed up with the proper tools and hardware and within 45 minutes had restored table to a better condition than it had been. He also was able to improve the action of the drawers, which had become so difficult to pull that I had stopped using them. All-in-all, a very satisfying visit!

Kevin did an excellent job assembling ikea cabinet. I’m extremely satisfied with his great work skills patience explaining everything about this cabinet. I didn’t have the ikea closet design so I drew a picture of cabinet I want and he did it exactly I need.

My tasker was prompt, efficient, trustworthy, and easy to have in our home. We liked that we could select from a number if taskers with descriptions and photos. It made meeting up with my tasker safely easier.

Tyler was timely and very professional. Made sure we were on the same page with each project. Easy to work with and would definitely work with him again. Highly recommend. Put together several pieces of furniture from IKEA that came with limited instruction. Mounted wall units without a problem. He also hung a sensory swing for my daughter and a few other projects in her playroom for us.
We had a small moving job that we needed help with.  We found Joel immediately and he did such an amazing job for us.TaskRabbit made solving our problem easy and efficient.

Easy to schedule date/time, on-time, professional, knowledgeable, quick, good workEstimate was two hours to put the bed together.  Michael M had it completed under one hour!  Was pleasantly surprised and happy that he didn’t charge the full two hour quote.  This shows integrity and professionalism and I would definitely recommend Michael M
I was very pleased with Mr. Wallace services. He was able to fix my plumbing issues, restored the hot water and resolved my toilet problem in my home. Quick and efficient.
He was great. Very prompt, courteous and dependable. Took care of the things really well and made sure it was seamless handling , unloading and arranging the goods and the boxes.

Review.Titre: Highly recommend Chafa on Task Rabbit!
Review.Contenu: I recently hired Chafa from Taskrabbit to build a daybed and a dresser from Wayfair, and I couldn't be happier with the results. Chafa exceeded my expectations by completing the task in under two hours! Their attention to detail and efficiency were truly impressive. The daybed and dresser were assembled flawlessly, and they even took the time to make sure everything was sturdy and secure. I highly recommend Chafa for any furniture assembly needs. Their expertise and speed make them a standout Taskrabbit hire. Five stars all the way!
Ivan did an amazing job.  He was very professional and he knew his product well.  He did the work in the estimated time given. I will definitely use Taskrabbit again.

I have certain things that either require heavy lifting, electrical work or just putting heavy some furniture together. I have found people who have been good, fast and easy to work with. The other nice thing is when I travelled to help my Mom, I was able to get Task Rabbit help in another state. It is great to have support that easily.

Look no further; Dejuante is the best! He arrived on time and assembled 2 large dressers and a daybed with drawers in a few hours (less time than estimated). He didn't even need the manual. I highly recommend him and will use him again in the future.

Wonderful experience. He was reliable, on-time and showed up with a great attitude. Rafael did a wonderful job hanging up multiple picture frames and curtains in my apartment. He continuously asked for my approvals and has a great point of view. I will hire him again!

Review.Titre: What made my experience great was I was…
Review.Contenu: What made my experience great was I was able to pay a reasonable amount of money to take care of my needs in my home & the Contractor who completed my projects!

Review.Titre: Taskrabbit is a great new resource for us!
Review.Contenu: Taskrabbit is a great new resource that I was previously unaware of.  We used a tasker for some long overdue yardwork and getting the garden ready for winter.  He was meticulous, worked efficiently, and we are delighted with the results.
My tasker was a great human being who took care of all the issues and moving I needed to have done. Taskrabbit customer service was also very helpful. Grateful for the experience.

John was running a bit behind but more than made up for it with his professional demeanor and did a great job mounting 2 TV's for your office.  He even went in and set them up.  Appreciated the above and beyond effort
The tasker who helped me was a great person. He was fast and very knowledgeable about the task. He finished it without wasting time so I will use Taskrabbit again.

Excellent service! He came earlier then scheduled and finished quickly. He came with all of his own tools and packages all of the pieces away once he was complete. Will use again ☺️ With that being said, just be mindful taskrabbit does have a hidden fee called a “trust fee” that was an additional $35 than the Taskers quoted price. I think this fee couldPossibly fluctuate depending on the task, this is not a fee associated with the tasker. I think this fee should be disclosed by taskrabbit prior to the service being scheduled. I will ask about all associated fees prior to booking the next task ☺️
Juan was exceptional. I would highly recommend him. He did everything in a gentle and timely manner. He was very helpful and methodical in his work. Juan is also a lovely person.
Weston K was great—he was professional, friendly, worked quickly, and did the task perfectly.
I wasn’t in town and he made this a seamless process even out of the country. Grateful for my taskrabbit!

Review.Titre: He showed up on time with…
Review.Contenu: The gentleman showed up on time with his own tools. He was fast and efficient. I would definitely use him again.
Abdel was wonderful!! He took care of the repairs which was needed in our bathroom, asked us our thoughts, and cleaned up afterwards. It was done exceptionally well.
EfficientCleaned up after himself and helped me with the empty boxesAlways focused on the task

Review.Titre: Our task rabbit was very capable
Review.Contenu: Our task rabbit was very capable, organized and available when we needed him.
The tasker communicated with me. Upon arrival, he was respectful and worked clean.

I am a single Grandpa and have used TaskRabbit countless times over a decade with amazing results: Moving assistance, uninstalling & installing TV's/plumbing/computers, putting furniture together and organizing the kitchen/pantry. It has almost always been a fantastic helpful experience as only one tasker out of around 15 was a bad apple. The rest were magnificent extremely talented skilled Taskers! Just a GREAT help when in need!
Essra V arrived on time, was polite, professional and efficient! This is my 2nd time using him for a job.
On time, worked consistently to put all our bedroom furniture together as well as a table.Very good at what he does..recommended.

Review.Titre: I have used Task Rabbit twice and have…
Review.Contenu: I have used Task Rabbit twice and have been very satisfied. Both times the people have done excellent workand very pleasant. I have recommed the app.
Ivan was very flexible with my schedule and did fantastic, and fast work. I will definitely hire him again for any furniture assembly needs!
