Our tasker was amazing! Xavier B. went above just what was requested. He made sure to get our pick-up on time, delivered what we needed, and even took the time to help our team set-up.

Review.Titre: Task Rabbit worked flawlessly! My job got done on time and efficiently!!
Review.Contenu: Robert F showed up on time was pleasant and efficient and got the job done perfectly! I will use him again!!
The two men were courteous, helpful and installed the couch in perfect time.
Anthony was a great help and made my moving experience easy; couldn’t have done it without him! 💪🏾
Martin came right on time with all his tools and was quick and efficient. Would definitely hire him again.

Review.Titre: I was struggling with ikea furniture I…
Review.Contenu: I was struggling with ikea furniture I just bought and was so frustrated I couldn’t assemble a table and my bed-frame. After a tasker helped me oh man I felt so happy. It was quick and satisfying. Will definitely use their services again.
The worker arrived in time, was very polite, worked in a timely fashion and got the job done.  We were very pleased.

Review.Titre: Great service to have available for…
Review.Contenu: Great service to have available for anyone needing an extra set or two of hands and expertise!  Most definitely will use Taskrabbit again!

Review.Titre: I got up in the morning saying these…
Review.Contenu: I got up in the morning saying these things need to be cleaned. Went on my computer put in my information and I hired a lady come the same day. Had everything done in 2 hours. She was through. I was very pleased .
It was easy to use the service and the worker was fantastic in his work and keeping informed of everything.

Review.Titre: Very easy to use site with all…
Review.Contenu: Very easy to use site with all important information easily available. It was super easy to choose the person I wanted to complete my task then establish ongoing communication with them. Definitely recommend using Taskrabbit for anything you can’t/don’t want to do yourself.
Great first experience, tasker communicated clearly and in a timely manner. Completed the task quickly and cleaned up afterwards. I felt safe and comfortable having them in my home.

Review.Titre: They came they did everything I asked…
Review.Contenu: They came they did everything I asked of them and then they came back on Monday and replaced the furniture where it came from originally. They were on time, texted when they were on the way. Clean and pleasant to be around.
Assembler Elana was knowledgeable ans efficient.  Worked cleanly and did a great job
He was very professional, quick, and showed great interest in the set up. I will use his service again and again.
Kirill was fast and efficient. I love the quality of work.

Review.Titre: Knowledge tasker with a great attitude
Review.Contenu: Knowledge tasker with a great attitude. He did a great job and did it quickly as well.

The appointment was very easy to schedule.  The assembler arrived on time and completed the task as estimated.Very efficient and neat.This is the 2nd time we have used this service and would do so again.

Review.Titre: Alex was extremely helpful with the…
Review.Contenu: Alex was extremely helpful with the task we needed. Will definitely need his services again
Kyle showed up right on time, (after I had to reschedule also) and completed the job in under 2 hours, which was impressive. I would definitely hire Kyle again.

Review.Titre: Alex was great… I see why he gets 5 stars!
Review.Contenu: Alex was great! Timely, professional and paid attention to detail! He made helpful suggestions for our closet system that made it more functional.
Love this app! Great experience each time!
Quick, timely, polite, patient, easy to book with lots of options of Taskers to choose from with great info. My tasker was awesome.

Review.Titre: She did a super magnificent job and…
Review.Contenu: She did a super magnificent job and would love to use her again.
My Task person was pleasant and efficient. He met the task job in the allotted time and did a great job. And I received $20 off as a first- timer. Definitely will do this again.
Agent got here early and was very efficient, getting the job done early.

Review.Titre: Tasker was polite respectful and knowledgeable
Review.Contenu: He was diligent and thorough. He cleaned up and was even willing to help place things back in order. What a pleasure to have someone who is not only skilled but works with integrity!
Eddie M. was punctual, efficient and personable.  He did the job in the estimated time. He was able to move everything himself, which is also what I needed.

Review.Titre: Anton was great and assembled a…
Review.Contenu: Anton was great and assembled a complicated IKEA daybed with expertise.

Review.Titre: Very good tool for furniture assembly
Review.Contenu: Very good tool for furniture assembly. Experts can complete the task quickly, making TaskRabbit very affordable.

Review.Titre: The Tasker Went Above and Beyond
Review.Contenu: The Tasker went above and beyond. I'll probably request this person again.

Review.Titre: Professional at making the job easy
Review.Contenu: The tasker I worked with was professional and thorough. Made it easy for me to focus on the many other things in my work day.

Review.Titre: Task Rabbit was a great Discovery
Review.Contenu: Task Rabbit was a great Discovery . It helps a lot & you don’t have to go look for ppl in the neighborhood.
Easy to book appointment quickly.  Tasker prompt, professional and knew what he was doing.  finished quickly.
Quality work & timely completion of job.
That day I had a no show from home Depot pro.  Task rabbit guy came the same day and did an amazing job! He was polite and patient.  He was quick too.
Amazing.  I will definitely be using again!
I was quickly able to find the help I needed. UI was easy to uses and communications were easy.
App is easy to use, and communicate with a quality handyperson.

Review.Titre: Was very easy to schedule someone to…
Review.Contenu: Was very easy to schedule someone to come within 2 days time. He came on a day and time convenient for us. Very respectful and polite.

Review.Titre: Very nice person great work resolving…
Review.Contenu: Very nice person great work resolving issues effectively knowledgeable good communication skills and genuine work

Review.Titre: Very happy with the job done
Review.Contenu: Very professional, did a great job with assembly. He will be my go to if I need another task!
Josh was great. He was very professional and he mounted both tv's without any issues.

Review.Titre: I hired someone to hook up all my TVs
Review.Contenu: I hired someone to hook up all my TVs, soundbars, wireless boxes, sub-woofers, etc. he was nest, smart and all TVs are working.  He did a very good job at a fair price!
Experience was wonderful. We had a really good guy named Alisijo and he did a great job.

Review.Titre: Did many different things around the…
Review.Contenu: Did many different things around the house in a quick time frame (much quicker than us). Was very friendly.
Excellent service from Fernando - very efficient, professional and easy to work with!
